workExperience.title: AI Engineer Intern
workExperience.roledesc: Enhancing enterprise-grade agentic AI systems by customizing frameworks like CrewAI, Autogen, and Langflow with modular components and control layers to support scalable, client-specific solutions. Building intelligent agent workflows using Langflow, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Chroma, MCPs, Composio, and LLMs to deliver flexible, production-ready architectures. Exploring and integrating no-code/low-code platforms to accelerate development and enable non-technical teams to contribute effectively. Managing backend infrastructure, implementing LLM observability and traceability, and optimizing pipelines to improve performance, decision transparency, and reliability in multi-agent environments.

workExperience.title: AI Engineer Intern
workExperience.roledesc: Led full-cycle development of scalable multi-agent AI systems across healthcare and surveying domains using FastAPI, Python, LLMs, and vector databases to deliver modular, high-performance solutions. Refactored existing pipelines to reduce response latency by 28% and cut inference costs by 12% through prompt optimization and intelligent model routing. Built intelligent agents for behavior tracking and personalized content generation, cutting LLM costs by 12% via prompt optimization and model routing. Automated healthcare data extraction from trusted sources like ClinicalTrials.gov and Amazon to generate accurate, user-centric care plans with minimal manual intervention. Authored comprehensive technical documentation to streamline onboarding, accelerate collaboration, and ensure long-term maintainability.
